Designed, modelled & rigged by Ben Tiefholz

I'm giving away my models. Free to use.

www.tiefholz.com
http://www.redbubble.com/people/datsunstyle
http://www.redbubble.com/people/tiefholz


Ben Tiefholz is in Tasmania. 
He has done animation and graphics for tv, 
planetarium, museum, and other things.

--

PEN_Attribute_holder_2.06.ms is the script needed for eye control.
